title: Display copyable /admin URL on the Admin page

requirements.summary: Add a copyable Admin URL display to the authenticated Admin management UI showing the full /admin URL with a copy-to-clipboard button and temporary success feedback
acceptanceCriteria: The Admin management UI (post-login) displays a labelled 'Admin URL' section showing the full URL ending in /admin.
The displayed URL is derived from window.location.origin + '/admin' so it works in both local and production environments.
A 'Copy' button is present next to the URL.
Clicking 'Copy' copies the URL to the clipboard using the Clipboard API.
After clicking 'Copy', the button temporarily shows 'Copied!' feedback for approximately 2 seconds before reverting.
The URL text is visually styled to stand out (e.g. monospace font, distinct background) consistent with the dark gaming theme.
The element is only visible inside the authenticated admin management UI, not on the password gate screen.

file_operations.description: Add a copyable Admin URL section inside the authenticated management UI (after successful password login). Derive the URL dynamically using window.location.origin + '/admin'. Render it in a styled read-only input or code block with monospace font and distinct background consistent with the dark gaming theme. Add a 'Copy' button that uses navigator.clipboard.writeText() to copy the URL and shows 'Copied!' feedback for 2 seconds using local state (useState with setTimeout). Label the section clearly as 'Admin URL'. Ensure the element appears only in the authenticated state, below the existing add-player form.
